snippet: The death toll in the magnitude 7.4 earthquake that hit Wednesday rose Thursday to 52, and 22 people are still missing, said President Otto Pérez Molina.
abstract: Death toll in magnitude 7.4 earthquake that hit Guatemala rises to 52, with 22 people still missing.
lead_paragraph: The death toll in the magnitude 7.4 earthquake that hit Wednesday rose Thursday to 52, and 22 people are still missing, said President Otto Pérez Molina.

headline.main: Guatemala: Death Toll Continues to Rise After Quake
headline.print_headline: Guatemala: Death Toll Continues to Rise After Quake
